patch.description: Update updates the specified account in the system.

get.description: Read returns the specified account from the system.

post.description: Token generates an oauth2 accessToken using Basic Auth with a user's email and password.
post.summary: Token handles a request to authenticate a user.

get.description: Find returns the existing projects in the system.

parameters.description: Order columns separated by comma, example: created_at desc
parameters.name: order

post.description: Create inserts a new project into the system.

patch.description: Update updates the specified project in the system.
Archive soft-deletes the specified project from the system.

get.description: Read returns the specified project from the system.

delete.description: Delete removes the specified project from the system.

post.description: Signup creates a new account and user in the system.

get.description: Find returns the existing user accounts in the system.

parameters.description: Order columns separated by comma, example: created_at desc
parameters.name: order

post.description: Create inserts a new user account into the system.

delete.description: Delete removes the specified user account from the system.
delete.summary: Delete user account by user ID and account ID

patch.description: Update updates the specified user account in the system.
patch.summary: Update user account by user ID and account ID

patch.description: Archive soft-deletes the specified user account from the system.
patch.summary: Archive user account by user ID and account ID

get.description: Read returns the specified user account from the system.
Find returns the existing users in the system.

parameters.description: Filter string, example: name = 'Company Name' and email = 'gabi.may@geeksinthewoods.com'
parameters.name: where

parameters.description: Order columns separated by comma, example: created_at desc
parameters.name: order

post.description: Create inserts a new user into the system.

patch.description: Update updates the specified user in the system.
Archive soft-deletes the specified user from the system.
Update updates the password for a specified user in the system.
SwitchAccount updates the auth claims to a new account.

get.description: Read returns the specified user from the system.

delete.description: Delete removes the specified user from the system.

scopes.admin: Grants administrative privileges with role of admin.
scopes.user: Grants basic privileges with role of user.
